Title: Drunken Master
Synopsis: An undisciplined boy must learn Drunken Fist Kung Fu in order to stop an assassin.

Title: Winners & Sinners
Synopsis: Fresh from prison, five friends try to stay crime free but inadvertently find themselves caught in a Triad war.

Title: Police Story
Synopsis: A virtuous Hong Kong police officer must clear his good name when the drug lords he is after frame him for the murder of a dirty cop.

Title: Once Upon a Time in China
Synopsis: Wong Fei-Hung must  his Aunt Yee while defending his martial arts school from the local militia.

Title: Ninja Scroll
Synopsis: A mysterious vagabond sets out on a journey to confront his past. Little does he know he is up against a demonic force of killers, with a ghost from his past as the leader.

Title: Ong-Bak: Muay Thai Warrior
Synopsis: When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.

Title: Game of Death
Synopsis: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

Title: New Police Story
Synopsis: A hero cop accidentally leads his team into a trap from which he is the only survivor. Drowning his guilt in booze, he is eventually assigned a new younger partner who turns out to have his own secrets.

Title: Fearless
Synopsis: A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.

Title: Ip Man
Synopsis: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the first martial arts master to teach the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun.

Title: The Raid: Redemption
Synopsis: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

Title: Enter the Dragon
Synopsis: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.
